attributes.action: Reduce Tax on Premium Petrol Grades which are proven to pollute less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to request the government to reduce tax on premium grade petrol and diesel and intead increase it on standard grades of fuel which is more harmful to the environment

See link http://www.bp.com/sectiongenericarticle.do?categoryId=4005567&contentId=7009013
